allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Guard deals/pipelines API calls with enableDeals feature flag

- Block CreateDeal, UpdateDeal, MarkDealWonLost, and DealNotesCreate
  endpoints with 403 when enableDeals is disabled
- Skip deals/pipelines fetching in PersonsLookup and GetConfig
  when enableDeals is disabled
- Rename notes route from /notes/person back to /notes for
  backward compatibility with extension v1.0.229
EOF
)")
